---
title: Pricing
description: Understanding Notte usage costs and credit-based billing
---

# Pricing

Notte tracks your usage via dollar-based credits which can be acquired through a subscription or through a direct purchase. If you are on a subscription plan, then your plan credits will refresh when your plan renews. You can purchase credits and subscribe to a plan on the [billing page](https://console.notte.cc/billing).

## Usage Costs

  <table className="w-full min-w-full border-collapse border border-gray-300 dark:border-gray-600 table-fixed">

        <th className="border border-gray-300 dark:border-gray-600 px-11 py-3 text-left font-semibold w-1/3">Notes</th>
      </tr>
    </thead>

    <tbody>
      <tr className="hover:bg-gray-50 dark:hover:bg-gray-700">
        <td className="border border-gray-300 dark:border-gray-600 px-11 py-3 font-medium">Browser Usage</td>
        <td className="border border-gray-300 dark:border-gray-600 px-11 py-3">\$0.05 / hour</td>
        <td className="border border-gray-300 dark:border-gray-600 px-11 py-3">Charged per minute, rounded up</td>
      </tr>

      <tr className="hover:bg-gray-50 dark:hover:bg-gray-700">
        <td className="border border-gray-300 dark:border-gray-600 px-11 py-3">Proxy Usage</td>
        <td className="border border-gray-300 dark:border-gray-600 px-11 py-3">\$10 / GB</td>
        <td className="border border-gray-300 dark:border-gray-600 px-11 py-3">Premium residential proxies included</td>
      </tr>

      <tr className="hover:bg-gray-50 dark:hover:bg-gray-700">
        <td className="border border-gray-300 dark:border-gray-600 px-11 py-3">Agent Steps / LLMs Usage</td>
        <td className="border border-gray-300 dark:border-gray-600 px-11 py-3">Pay token price</td>
        <td className="border border-gray-300 dark:border-gray-600 px-11 py-3">Pay what you use with no markup</td>
      </tr>
    </tbody>
  </table>
</div>

## Example

An agent running for 1 minute with 10 steps using Chrome with US proxies enabled:

* **LLM Usage (Gemini 2.0 Flash)**: 112k tokens ≈ **\$0.015**
* **Browser Usage**: 1 minute at \$0.05/hour ≈ **\$0.001**
* **Proxy Usage**: 10MB Data Transfer at \$10/GB ≈ **\$0.10**
* **Total: \~\$0.116**

> Gemini 2.0 Flash pricing: \$0.10/1M input / \$0.40/1M output tokens
